script: Who is covering Maria's shift at the clinic on Saturday?
options: Yes, click on the check box.
Cover the pot on the stove.
Alexi is going to do it.

script: Would you like to meet the new clients?
options: Sure, I have some time right now.

script: Here's my presentation proposal.
options: Thanks, I'll look over it shortly.

script: Do the city buses stop in the front or the back of the city hall building?
options: There's a stop in the front.

script: Why is the ceremony being moved indoors?
options: It was nice seeing her there.
Because there's rain in the forecast.
I'll hold the door for you.

script: I just love the taste of coffee, don't you?
Are you interested in a freelance translation job?
options: No, I'm too busy these days.

script: Could you send me this month's maintenance schedule?
Doesn't our firm reimburse travel expenses?
options: Yes, but only flight and hotel.

script: I need to stop at the pharmacy on my way to work.
options: Oh, could you buy something for me?

script: Why are we meeting to discuss the budget?
options: Have you seen last quarter's sales figures?
I'd like to, but it's expensive.

script: When does your flight land in Los Angeles?
options: They bought a plot of land.

script: How do I sign up for the accounting webinar?
What kind of food should I bring to the company picnic?
options: They hired a catering service this year.
Yes, Barbara will be at the meeting.

script: Where did you put my copy of our project proposal?
options: Actually, only the charts are in color.

script: How many more deliveries are we expecting today?
options: I can wait for them if you need to leave.
No, it should be less than that.

script: When are we handing out the employee survey?
options: On a scale of one to ten.
Have a seat in the front row.
Probably at the end of the quarter.

script: Would you like me to send you samples of the fabrics we have available?
options: They built a brick wall around the garden.
I saw the pictures on your Web site.

script: Her contract ends next month, doesn't it?
options: I'm sure it will get renewed.

script: Should we open the store at eight thirty or nine on Saturday?
options: Since it's a holiday, let's open later.

script: What kinds of audiobooks do you listen to?
options: Could you turn the volume down please?

script: How long will it take to receive a confirmation e-mail?
options: It shouldn't take more than a few minutes.
The construction noise is getting worse.
The color will fade in direct sunlight.

script: Where should I have the workers stack the cases when they arrive?
options: It was a challenging legal case.

script: Would offering more specialty breads attract more customers?
Who's going with you to the technology convention?
options: Management budgeted for only one attendee.
